content: 7 st left on needle wrap and turn purl until 7 st left on needle wrap and turn knit until 8 st left on needle wrap and turn purl until 8 st left on needle wrap and turn knit until 9 st left on needle wrap and turn purl until 9 st left on needle wrap and turn knit until 10 st left on needle wrap and turn purl until 10 st left on needle wrap and turn knit until 11 st left on needle wrap and turn purl until 11 st left on needle wrap and turn knit until 10 st left on needle wrap and turn purl until 10 st left on needle wrap and turn knit until 9 st left on needle wrap and turn purl until 9 st left on needle wrap and turn knit until 8 st left on needle wrap and turn purl until 8 st left on needle wrap and turn knit until 7 st left on needle wrap and turn purl until 7 st left on needle wrap and turn knit until 6 st left on needle wrap and turn purl until 6 st left on needle wrap and turn knit until 5 st left on needle wrap and turn purl until 5 st left on needle wrap and turn knit until 4 st left on needle wrap and turn purl until 4 st left on needle wrap and turn knit until 3 st left on needle wrap and turn purl until 3 st left on needle wrap and turn knit 29 st leg knit 32 charted stitches continue knitting in the round again for 6 rounds cuff ribbing round *k1 p1 repeat from * until end of round repeat ribbing round for 10 rounds bind off sew in all ends and make sure intarsia ends are sewn in securely as well sew whiskers for the cat starting from 1 st away from the nose stitches to around 5- 6 stitches away block and wear 3 chart 4
